description:
The vice-captain of the elite adventurer party, "Silverwing Battalion". A female swordsman with the alias "Crimson Flash". Wears red bikini armor because it makes her stand out. She is the one who invited Dennis to "Silverwing Battalion", and she continues to care about him even after he was exiled from the party. Her favorite food is the "Hamburg steak" made by Dennis.
Source: Official page
name: Katie
